p: Total RNA was extracted separately from roots, stems, flowers, and leaves using TRIzol reagent (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, United States) according to the manufacturer’s instructions and mixed equally to build up the RNA libraries accordingly. The purity, content, and integrity of total RNA were checked with the NanoPhotometer ® spectrophotometer (Implen, Westlake Village, CA, United States), a Qubit ® Flurometer (Life Technologies, Carlsbad, CA, United States), and the Agilent Bioanalyzer 2100 system (Agilent Technologies, Palo Alto, CA, United States), respectively.
